actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-51.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 383 - 0 (Record Vote No: 72).
Motion to Reconsider Tabled in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 212 - 157 (Record Vote No: 73).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2068) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1986 and 1987 for the Department of State, the United States Information Agency, the Board of International Broadcasting, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2068 (Department of State and related agencies funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2068) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1986 and 1987 for the Department of State, the United States Information Agency, the Board of International Broadcasting, and for other purposes.
